main event: A witness observed a bright UFO in Coeburn, Virginia on August 29, 1959.
interesting points: The object was described as being about twice as bright as the largest star in the night sky., The object's color changed from reddish to white, then to green, and back to white., The witness saw the object traveling slower than anything they had previously witnessed., There was ongoing interest from the Air Force regarding the UFO and analysis of a photograph., Analysis concluded that the photograph taken of the object was likely an out-of-focus image or affected by developing errors.
witness description: A high school student and their mother-in-law.
